chunks.text:
CC: Mohammed El Neel <Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com>; Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>; Rami Riman <Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com>; Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-04 11:15
Subject: RE: STORE CLOSURE - Courcelles Dubai Mall on Thu 31st Oct 2024
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a store closure of  “Courcelles  Dubai Mall on Thursday 31st Oct 2024.

 

You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

*	@Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  @Please share the documentation at the earliest to store email to apply for permits.
*	Create a Return to warehouse by @Rimaz Algadoumi <mailto:Rimaz.Algadoumi@chalhoub.com>  and create an appointment/ ASN request trough one reach for all merchandising.
*	Apply for Work Mall/police permit (return stocks, transfer / stock packing/ IT Equipment) @Courcelles Dubai Mall <mailto:Courcelles.tdm@chalhoub.com> @Mustafa Dafer <mailto:Mustafa.Dafer@chalhoub.com> 
*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different bag on 31st Oct. @Courcelles Dubai Mall <mailto:Courcelles.tdm@chalhoub.com> @Mustafa Dafer <mailto:Mustafa.Dafer@chalhoub.com> 
*	Credit card machine with manual invoice book to be transferred through Focus request non stock to Ghouse khan @Courcelles Dubai Mall <mailto:Courcelles.tdm@chalhoub.com> @Mustafa Dafer <mailto:Mustafa.Dafer@chalhoub.com> 
*	Store phone devices/I pads if available to be transferred to Kids Around store  @Mustafa Dafer <mailto:Mustafa.Dafer@chalhoub.com> @Courcelles Dubai Mall <mailto:Courcelles.tdm@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  please ensure all CCTV camera and NVR is dismantled on 31st Oct before trading hours

chunks.text:
ourcelles Dubai Mall <mailto:Courcelles.tdm@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  please ensure all CCTV camera and NVR is dismantled on 31st Oct before trading hours 

*	IT Equipment dismantling on 1st Nov Jun before trading hours by @Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com> @Real Emirates - IT <mailto:RealEmirates-IT@chalhoub.com> 
*	All contracts documents to be cancelled on 1st Nov  @Shibu <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>  @Connie <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  @Mary <mailto:MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com>  @Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  @Sharon <mailto:Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com>  @Lorena Dimaala <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com> 
*	Ensure all Store credits are redeemed before 31st Oct if there is any. @Courcelles Dubai Mall <mailto:Courcelles.tdm@chalhoub.com> @Mustafa Dafer <mailto:Mustafa.Dafer@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  please inform TG team to collect all cash from boutique on 1st Nov morning and cancel their service as well from 2nd Nov.
*	@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  Please ensure to share the Audited sales report after the store closure.
*	@Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com> @Mary Janice Dofeliz <mailto:MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com>  Please ensure Dewa Etisalat accounts are closed.
*	Stock take to be conducted on 29th or 30th Oct @Alof Joseph <mailto:Alof.Joseph@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Rimaz Algadoumi <mailto:Rimaz.Algadoumi@chalhoub.com>  raise an MDM request to close store ID on 2nd Nov 2024.

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach out at 050-3859997.
